医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
昆士兰大学研究人员发起世界上最大的药物调查昆士兰大学的研究人员发起了世界上最大的毒品调查，以深入了解全球的毒品使用情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/UQ-researchers-launch-the-worlds-biggest-drug-survey.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/UQ-researchers-launch-the-worlds-biggest-drug-survey.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=04a2576e-2d33-453b-8565-9766ed283d12 Tue, 09 Jan 2024 23:49:00 -0500 UQ researchers launch the world's biggest drug survey
蛋白质秘密揭晓：单分子光谱学迎来个性化医疗时代使用基于近场光学显微镜的先进测量技术观察单个蛋白质的红外振动光谱。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/Protein-secrets-revealed-Single-molecule-spectroscopy-ushers-in-era-of-personalized-medicine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/Protein-secrets-revealed-Single-molecule-spectroscopy-ushers-in-era-of-personalized-medicine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=568b700f-f1c4-498a-b49d-ac3395974e29 Tue, 09 Jan 2024 23:46:19 -0500 Protein secrets revealed: Single-molecule spectroscopy ushers in era of personalized medicine
不仅仅是 NHS 的创可贴：领导者需要阻止医生和护士跳槽根据对英国医院资源不足和高压急诊科影响的最新研究，繁忙医院中的一线医护人员感觉他们“只是在重新布置泰坦尼克号上的躺椅”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/More-than-band-aids-for-the-NHS-Leaders-needed-to-stop-doctors-and-nurses-jumping-ship.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/More-than-band-aids-for-the-NHS-Leaders-needed-to-stop-doctors-and-nurses-jumping-ship.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6e1846c2-b1a4-45cd-8dbd-bef6171bd8ae Tue, 09 Jan 2024 23:38:06 -0500 More than band-aids for the NHS: Leaders needed to stop doctors and nurses jumping ship
植物性饮食对 COVID-19 具有抗病毒作用发表在开放获取期刊 BMJ Nutrition Prevention & Health 上的研究发现，以植物性饮食或素食为主的饮食可使感染 COVID-19 的几率降低 39%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/Plant-based-diets-pack-an-antiviral-punch-against-COVID-19.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/Plant-based-diets-pack-an-antiviral-punch-against-COVID-19.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=36d7439c-bbb4-419f-8b1a-57b6a6a060a2 Tue, 09 Jan 2024 23:06:00 -0500 Plant-based diets pack an antiviral punch against COVID-19
研究确定了女性类风湿性关节炎的激素和生殖因素一项发表的大型长期研究发现，提前绝经——45 岁之前——接受激素替代疗法 (HRT)，以及生育 4 个或更多孩子是与女性患类风湿性关节炎风险增加相关的几个激素和生殖因素之一。在开放获取期刊 RMD Open 中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/Study-identizes-hormonal-and-reproductive-factors-for-rheumatoid-arthritis-in-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/Study-identizes-hormonal-and-reproductive-factors-for-rheumatoid-arthritis-in-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=33f96deb-bc7b-4785-90a5-24c7092a61ee Tue, 09 Jan 2024 23:01:31 -0500 Study identifies hormonal and reproductive factors for rheumatoid arthritis in women
卡维地洛改善儿童癌症幸存者的心脏健康指标美国最大的癌症研究和治疗组织之一的 City of Hope 的医生与儿童肿瘤学小组 (COG) 合作，进行了迄今为止最大规模的临床试验，旨在降低儿童期存活下来的人的风险心力衰竭引起的癌症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/Carvedilol-improves-heart-health-marker-in-childhood-cancer-survivors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/Carvedilol-improves-heart-health-marker-in-childhood-cancer-survivors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b20eb9a8-ab99-4baa-b31f-f3702de4adba Tue, 09 Jan 2024 22:48:33 -0500 Carvedilol improves heart health marker in childhood cancer survivors
“TimeMachine”算法彻底改变了单血样昼夜节律分析“TimeMachine”是美国研究人员开发的一种算法，利用基因表达从单个血液样本中准确预测昼夜节律阶段，为了解昼夜节律及其对健康的影响提供了一种新颖、有效的方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/TimeMachine-algorithm-revolutionizes-circadian-rhythm-analysis-with-single-blood-sample.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/TimeMachine-algorithm-revolutionizes-circadian-rhythm-analysis-with-single-blood-sample.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d5ea811b-909f-4220-8e63-c41aaca4e849 Tue, 09 Jan 2024 22:13:00 -0500 "TimeMachine" algorithm revolutionizes circadian rhythm analysis with single blood sample
可注射水凝胶为无痛除颤和预防心律失常铺平了道路由德克萨斯心脏研究所 (THI) 的 Mehdi Razavi 博士领导的一项突破性研究，与由 Elizabeth Cosgriff-Hernandez 博士领导的德克萨斯大学奥斯汀分校 (UT Austin) 科克雷尔工程学院的生物医学工程团队合作，确定为治疗室性心律失常的突破性治疗方案奠定了基础。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/Injectable-Hydrogel-paves-the-way-for-painless-defibrillation-and-arrythmia-prevention.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/Injectable-Hydrogel-paves-the-way-for-painless-defibrillation-and-arrythmia-prevention.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f09aee26-6a27-4cab-bf78-de966fbb032c Tue, 09 Jan 2024 22:12:26 -0500 Injectable hydrogel paves the way for painless defibrillation and arrhythmia prevention
帕金森氏症治疗的新方法侧重于阻止有毒蛋白质的产生就像希腊神话中长着蛇尾和两个凶猛头颅的野兽一样，化学家马修·迪士尼博士的实验室创造的一种潜在的帕金森病药物也是一种长着两个头的嵌合体。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/New-approach-to-Parkinsons-treatment-focuses-on-stopping-毒-蛋白-生产.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/New-approach-to-Parkinsons-treatment-focuses-on-stopping-毒-蛋白质-生产.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ee104b33-3c9a-43d0-8ffd-9bbf7032e658 Tue, 09 Jan 2024 22:07:32 -0500 New approach to Parkinson's treatment focuses on stopping toxic protein production
新模型预测个体骨髓瘤风险和治疗反应由迈阿密大学米勒医学院西尔维斯特综合癌症中心的研究人员领导的多中心合作，为新诊断的多发性骨髓瘤创建了第一个计算模型，该模型根据肿瘤基因组学和治疗来预测个体的个性化预后。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/New-model-predicts-individual-myeloma-risk-and-treatment-response.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/New-model-predicts-individual-myeloma-risk-and-treatment-response.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a089f456-c0e0-4300-8863-ddc6ed4cc7d2 Tue, 09 Jan 2024 22:00:57 -0500 New model predicts individual myeloma risk and treatment response
